attributes.action: Make employers recruit people that don't have jobs over those who already have a job
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Some people are resorting to have 2 jobs, either a full time job and a part time job or 2 part time jobs due to the economic climate.

With an increasing number of people becoming unemployed, I think its only fair that employers should give priority to those who don't have any jobs when they recruiting for staff. How demoralising is it for the unemployed if they find out the part time job they applied for, a person who already has a job got the job?

Using this tactic will be better for the community and the economy.
